channel.title: Need some Coder Help
channel.description: How do I make an item be held like a 2h and not a regular sword...So the item gets put over the shoulder like a 2h...Any help??? Ty to every. Reward will be awarded

item.title: Need some Coder Help
item.dc:creator: @SockScape SockScape
item.description:
@SockScape wrote:

[quote=“nd w0t, post:8, topic:143013”]Maybe wrong but, ill give it a go…
in client.java search for…

public int GetRunAnim(int id)

Then search for the weapon you want, EXAMPLE

if(id == 4153)//Granite Maul
{
return 1664;
}

Thats when you run with a G Maul, it uses it like runescape, all you need to do, is replace the ID, and the emote, and thats sorted, now… search for this…

public int GetWalkAnim(int id)

And again, do the same as you did above… Next, search for this

public int GetStandAnim(int id)

And once again, change item ID and the emote, and your done ;)…

P.S – This is to change the block animation

public int GetBlockAnim(int id)

H2H[/quote]
Thats kinda like what I brenden I Said…

Read full topic

item.title: Need some Coder Help
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

Maybe wrong but, ill give it a go…
in client.java search for…

public int GetRunAnim(int id)

Then search for the weapon you want, EXAMPLE

if(id == 4153)//Granite Maul
{
return 1664;
}

Thats when you run with a G Maul, it uses it like runescape, all you need to do, is replace the ID, and the emote, and thats sorted, now… search for this…

public int GetWalkAnim(int id)

And again, do the same as you did above… Next, search for this

public int GetStandAnim(int id)

And once again, change item ID and the emote, and your done ;)…

P.S – This is to change the block animation

public int GetBlockAnim(int id)

H2H

Read full topic

item.title: Need some Coder Help
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

How many times have I heard that I’ll get a reward? Actually, unless it’s money in RS2 (Which I doubt) then I don’t want it. Thanks anyway.

So, umm. Do this for me, search for the identification number of the item’s animation you want to change. Copy and paste the code then post it here (In [ code ] tags please), then search for the item identification number of any 2h sword and copy that here too. This is in client.Java by the way.

Read full topic

item.description:

Read full topic

item.title: Need some Coder Help
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Change the animation. Search for the items’ identification number in client.Java a couple of times until you see the animation for running, standing still, etc and mimic it to that of a 2h sword or weapon.

Read full topic
